title: Pixel 4 XL 'Cannot verify face try again'
content:
I bought this pixel 4 XL on release, since then it's worked great. Since the November security patch my face unlock is broken and will not work on my device. 
I've tried simply removing face data and re-enrolling. 
I've tried booting into safe mode and trying there. 
I've even went as far as resetting to factory settings and trying again but no dice. 

Is this a hardware issue? If so how do I go about RMAing this device?
